Name: Port Carnelian Market
Description: Not just sapphires. Although there are quite a lot of sapphires.

Shops.Name: Dockside Market
Shops.Description: The stalls are almost the same as Wolfstack. So are the sounds. The scents are utterly different.

Shops.Name: Sapphire Exchange
Shops.Description: Actually, this place is indeed mostly sapphires.
